Description: Limestone ostracon containing a Coptic letter from Apa Abraham threatening to excommunicate mean or women who divorce for any reason other than adultry.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Henri Édouard Naville (1893-94, on behalf of EEF)
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (390643) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/390643)
Additional IDs: Miscellaneous number: O.Crum 72 (text edition abbreviation according to Oates et al 2001)
